channel.title: CleanUp on Terraform Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in CleanUp on Terraform Workshop

item.title: Instance
item.description: Terraform 명령으로 삭제 합니다. cd terraform-env-workshop/instance terraform destroy aws_instance.this: Refreshing state... [id=i-0390f0e077a519e15] An execution plan has been generated and is shown below. Resource actions are indicated with the following symbols: - destroy Terraform will perform the following actions: # aws_instance.this will be destroyed - resource "aws_instance" "this" { .... } Plan: 0 to add, 0 to change, 1 to destroy. Do you really want to destroy all resources? Terraform will destroy all your managed infrastructure, as shown above.
